Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Brie cheese \Brie" cheese`\ (br[=e]" ch[=e]z`). A kind of soft French cream cheese; -- so called from the district in France where it is made; it is milder than Camembert; -- called also {fromage de Brie}, {Brie} and {brie} (uncapitalized). [Webster 1913 Suppl. + WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Brie n : soft creamy white cheese; milder than Camembert
